title: Steven P. Ringel, MD Endowed Education Fund
description: To support a lectureship series in the Department of Neurology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus.  Expenditures may include speaker travel, honorariums and lodging.
marketingContent: To support a lectureship series in the Department of Neurology at the University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus. Expenditures may include speaker travel, honorariums and lodging.
